meanings.def: used to emphasize the size, degree or amount of something
examples: The area is under threat from the sheer number of tourists using it.
We were impressed by the sheer size of the cathedral.

meanings.def: complete and not mixed with anything else
examples: I only agreed out of sheer desperation.
Outside there was a sheer drop down to the sea below.
The cliffs rise sheer from the beach.
The ground dropped sheer away at our feet.
